title: Aacardi-The Salon
address: 4046 Park St N, Saint Petersburg, FL, 33709
description: Aacardi is one of the largest full-service salons in the Tampa Bay region also offering salon products through the Internet. The salon s hair care services for men and women include haircut and styling, beard trim, blow dry and flat iron, braids, coloring and perming. Its hair and scalp spa treatments include strength recovery for distressed hair, color recovery for color-treated hair, softness recovery for dry and brittle hair, and smooth recovery for dry and unruly hair. It also offers reconditioning and scalp massage treatments. The company provides a wide range of nail care services, such as hand or foot gommage, hot oil manicure, French polish, nail art, light dryer, spa treatment aromatherapy manicure and pedicure, buff and polish and paraffin wax treatment for hands and feet. It also provides skin care and massage services. Aacardi offers gift certificates for all products and services and is headquartered in St. Petersburg, Fla.

title: Andover Hair Removal Center
description: Permanent hair removal for your face and body has never been easier. Andover Hair Removal Center offers the latest technology to permanently remove hair for all ages, skin tones and genders. Our professional and accredited staff offers informative consultations to help you. We specialize in permanently shaping eyebrows, and also removing hair from : face, upper lip and chin, arms and underarms, abdomen, bikini lines, legs and thighs, fingers and toes, ears and glabellas (between eyebrows). Owner, Rachel Peterson is licensed and a member of the American Electrology Association and the Massachusetts Association of Electrologists. She is also a licensed instructor for the State of Massachusetts. Stop by or call today for more information or to set up a consultation.
